based on the break-in patterns,

she's broke y'all.

she engineered some

Moon Girl fires off
her signature boxing gloves!

The voice is literally
describing everything
happening right now!

You really wanna be playin'

Thanks for the heel up,
Moon Girl!
Okay! You might have a point.

I gotta rest up
for the big day tomorrow!

No, no, no, no, no.
Not National Hot Dog Day.

The official launch
of this year's science fair!

And this year,
we have a special prize
for our first place winner.

This year's grand prize
will be...
Hey! I was just gettin' into it!

As I was saying, this year's
grand prize will be...

a personal tour of the most
technologically-advanced
building here in Manhattan,

As usual, the competition
will be a 48-hour challenge.

This year, we're doing it
in randomly assigned teams.

This 'bout to be the best combo
since bread and butta' baby!

CASEY: You must've done

in a past life

Some of the most brilliant
Black minds on the planet!

Ugh! This day
couldn't get any worse.

a little underground tech!

Okay, I admit that was weird
but please don't get upset!

You should see the look

Oh, I'm not from Earth at all!

Whoa, has that always
been there?

You're the one
who was in my ear last night?!

Some funky, shape-shifting
space wizard with
a bad stage name?!

I've got more
goin' on than that.

Lemme clue you in
with a little--
what do you humans call it?

♪ I'm from way-way
Beyond time and space ♪

♪ It's my job to study planets

♪ Then one day I was tasked ♪

And learn 'bout human beings ♪

♪ I need the smartest
On the planet ♪

All about humans ♪

to understand ♪

♪ Now it's time
to help this fella ♪
I do not have time for this.

Ayy!
How dare you interrupt
someone as powerful as me?!

No shade, but Lunella herself
ripped a hole in space and time.

So it takes a lot
to impress us, pal.

Do whatever this
magical creature says, Lunella.

Pump your brakes, pal!
I got a science fair to win.
But I need your help to decide--
But I'm taking these with me.

I stayed up all night
and came up

with the award-winning idea
for the fair!

For real?
'Cause I got an awesome idea
for the science fair thing too!

yesterday on the train,
I saw this dude making

all kinds of dope music
with random trash
so I'm thinkin' for the fair,

we could build a machine thingy
that hits another thingy

but ours smacks into other stuff
and goes brap-pap-pap!

In fact, I happened to come up
with basically the same thing!

But instead of hitting a thingy,
it absorbs CO2

Hold up, that doesn't
really sound like my--

LUNELLA:
Well, I just convinced Ed-weirdo

to do my brilliant
science fair idea.

A household ventilation system
that sucks in air, removes CO2,

and combines it with hydrogen
to create solid reusable carbon!

I can smell the Wakanda

I thought I told you
to be-gone-der!

No, you told me

so I figured I'd just come here
to learn human stuff.

Why do you humans
eat all this junk?

Y'know, I could make
a single pellet

with all the nutrients

Eating is supposed
to be enjoyable.

One, you better
bippity boppity boop
me a new sandwich, okay?

And two, you're supposed
to take small human bites.

Break it down
into little pieces.
Which is how I'll make sure

Eduardo doesn't mess up
the project!

C'mon and ditch this pointless
science fair thing

and focus on something
more important: me.

I need to learn more
about you Earthlings!

I got some tight ideas
on how build our project!

I took the liberty of breaking
down the project

into super easy
to assemble pieces

Look, just stay
out of our way, okay?

The human reaction to peril
is so intriguing!

you are getting
beyond my last nerve!

Hey. You wanna fight
a giant hot dog monster?

I built the base like you said,
and then I figured,

we could work my killer
idea into the project too!
Check it out!

but we can finish this baby
tomorrow before the fair!
One! To just follow the manual!

What is the human obsession
with re-makes?!
I tried to be a team player.

What is the point of working
with other people

if they don't bring
anything to the table!?

That's why I wanted to learn
about humans in the first place.

To figure out whether
they're worthy of existence.

You cut me off before I could

♪ To get rid of all humans... ♪

Let's get this over with
so we can grab some dinner.
No! No, no, no. Stop! Please!

Just gimme a chance
to change your mind!

as its weakest link.

And according to you,
Eduardo is the most
So, if you can prove his value

When you put it like that,

You gotta win
this competition, Lu!

The only way to win

without Eduardo around

How in the world am I gonna
work on it all alone

It's crazy, we were
just talking about you.

Of course you were.
I'm fascinating.

And, uh, Casey
was saying how much

she wanted to show you

I mean, lots of cool stuff.

Well, if it serves
to distract you

I'm comin' to your spot
after school

I was looking

but it's super important
for our project!

It's the only thing that'll make

Which is why I'm entrusting you

'Cause Super Eduardo is here

'cause his gonna go and find it!
Phew! That should keep him busy!

Now, let's juice
this project up!

I had to search
a buncha different stores!

So where's our project!?
I'm ready to rock this thing!

For real though,
where's our project?
But where's the stuff I did?

Well, I had to make
a few tweaks.

You didn't even need
this thing, did you?

You just wanted to keep me away
so you could toss out my idea
and do the whole thing alone.

Look, I needed to make a project
that could actually win.

But this was supposed to be
my project too!

Winning this fair
is really important,

more important
than you could imagine.

Just write your name
on our project.
I know I kid around and stuff,

but this wasn't some joke
to me, Lunella.

I really wanted
to make something dope,

something to show everyone that
I'm smart and have ideas too.

That's why I was so juiced
when we got paired

'cause out of everyone
in our class,
But, I guess I was wrong.
Big B! My Dawg! Lookin' good!
Oh! Um, he's on the way!

Running a bit behind.

You're gonna love this one, huh!

It's one of those things

See, I know you did

I knew your plan as soon

I only went along
with the mani/pedi

Anyways you can't use this

See ya in a few hours, genius!

Um, I'm sure the judges

That's it,
busted and brined by Beyonder.

Well, use that amazing brain

Now, I'm gonna lose this fair
and the world

EDUARDO: Sheesh,
you nerds really do take

Not for you.
I got my own project.

This was supposed

Yeah, well, looks like

cause my idea didn't turn out

I couldn't figure out

the way I imagined
but I just think

it's so cool how stuff

can end up
making dope sounds.

Well that's the marvel
of density,

matter, and sound waves
my friend--

Psht! I know that!
About what tho?

Your idea and the compelling
science behind it!

With some extra supplies
and an engineer's touch,

I'm pretty sure we can
make it actually work!

-I just hope it's not too late--
-Too late? Psht!

I am The King
of last-minute projects.

And I'm still in it to win it
as long as you are.

All right, Lafayette,
you bring the science,

Sometimes we
overlook amazing things
that are right in front of us.

This machine uses
everyday objects to explore

how sound waves move
through a multitude of mediums.

Let the beat drop.

For our project,
we turned ourselves

into magnets that are

Sorry to interrupt
but it's time.

Oh, ho, ho,
this one's a fighter!

I proved that people
are brilliant

I wouldn't even have a project
if it weren't for Eduardo!
Oh, man, I had you goin'!

I'm not really gonna erase
humanity, Lunella.
I was just having some fun!

I actually changed my mind

Sure, you clearly weren't

but between your smarts

you two made something

You showed me that
everybody is valuable.

Girl, you know

-when I come back.

You humans are way more

lifts my soul,
